content: moogly she shows how to hold the yarn and hook how to make a slipknot how to make a chain and how to single_crochet http //www mooglyblog com/learn-how-to-crochet/ left-handed video http //www mooglyblog com/how-to-crochet-left-handed/ share your blanket with #thelivelyblanket on instagram tag me @prettypeacefulcrochet because i love to see your blankets please feel free to sell finished items made from this pattern and give design credit as the lively blanket crochet pattern by pretty peaceful not for commercial use please do not share photos of this pattern only share the link to the pattern pdf on ravelry or youtube thank you for your support the lively blanket crochet pattern © 2023 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful
